description.value:
Primary Energy: Space 7 (long-range teleportation) Supporting Energy: None (touch, instantaneous, up to 8 willing creatures) Range: self, touch (up to 8 willing creatures) Duration: Instantaneous Total Cost: 7 Energy base (more for longer distances or more creatures) Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Space Potential + Space Mastery Effect: Instantly transport to destination on same plane. Number of success required depends on familiarity. Saving Throw: None Success Scaling: 0 = fails, 1 = mishap, 2 = Very familiar, 3 = visited a few times

---
